TI_TEXT.P: Servicii de învăţământ şi formare profesională

SHORT_DESCR.P: The Council is looking to establish a framework of high quality Apprenticeship Training Providers in order to deliver a range of apprenticeships for its 6 000 workforce (11 500 including schools), utilising the apprenticeship levy.
